title: MC_SetKinTransform (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_SetKinTransform
This function block sets a kinematic transformation between
the axis coordinate system (ACS) and the machine coordinate system
(MCS).
Note
A tool offset (see
SMC_GroupSetTool
) will be reset
when executing this function block.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axis

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Sets the kinematic transformation on rising edge

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The transformation has been set successfully

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
